remarks: Technical lemma for ~ bnj852 .  This lemma may no longer be used or have become an indirect lemma of the theorem in question (i.e. a lemma of a lemma... of the theorem).  (Contributed by Jonathan Ben-Naim, 3-Jun-2011.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
bnj590.1 $e |- ( ps <-> A. i e. _om ( suc i e. n -> ( f ` suc i ) = U_ y e. ( f ` i ) _pred ( y , A , R ) ) ) $.
bnj590 $p |- ( ( B = suc i /\ ps ) -> ( i e. _om -> ( B e. n -> ( f ` B ) = U_ y e. ( f ` i ) _pred ( y , A , R ) ) ) ) $.
